txt.en: You have been cordially invited to the Yule Festival celebration in the Frostbluff region, in the town of Winter-home.

Dear [placeholder],

You are cordially invited to join our Yule Festival celebration in Winter-home. We have many events to suit your taste, whether you like eating contests, snowball-fights, the theatre, or simply helping folks around town.

This notice is meant to introduce you to what the festival has to offer, especially our new celebration event.

We hope to see you here soon, before we get snowed in!

Albert Yule, the Town Crier

Many events are featured in the Yule Festival this year. Notable places to visit include: 

-The Thorin's Hall Inn 
-The Horsefields Festival Grounds (Bree)
-The Party Tree (the Shire)
-The Duillond Festival Area
-The new Winter Region of Frostbluff 

This notice is meant to direct you to the new festival area.
'Are you looking to go to Frostbluff, [placeholder]? I am ready to take you there! I hear there is a fine festival going on. Hopefully, the roads haven't been snowed out....'
